ygData.subject: Re: Power Leveling at 30?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is possible to powerlvl anytime anywhere...You just the right person helping you.  Being a tank or meelee character it is Rather easy to powerlvl. Go to
ygData.messageBody:
>Is it still possible to power level during a hell level, and if yes, where
>is
>a good spot to power? All help is appreciated. Thanks.
>
>Nigil GreenLeaf
>~Veeshan~

It is possible to powerlvl anytime anywhere...You just the right person
helping you. Being a tank or meelee character it is Rather easy to
powerlvl. Go to anyplace that has barely red mobs(i have heard that about
your lvl Cazic is real nice...heard) Have a much higher lvl healer type with
you-un grouped- and have them super buff you and heal you while you go at
the red ones solo. If your buddy is a caster type have them nuke the mob to
almost death...mem erase it(enchanters) or have them zone and you just go in
and mop up the mostly dead creature Full exp for you :)
It is much harder to powerlvl if you r a caster....the 6 lvl cap on what you
can hit along with the resist rate being high:( still a healer for your pet
if you got one Helps ALOT or just have them nuke then zone again then u
blast it to Death :)
For other places i am not sure at all being that my mage is about lvl 20 I
hope this helps any at all good luck :)

Arkania
Nameless
